title: A Wrinkle in Time
description: Winner of the 1963 Newbery MedalIt was a dark and stormy night.Out of this wild night, a strange visitor comes to the Murry house and beckons Meg, her brother Charles Wallace, and their friend Calvin O'Keefe on a most dangerous and extraordinary adventureâ€”one that will threaten their lives and our universe.A Wrinkle in Time is the first book in Madeleine L'Engle's classic Time Quintet.
author: Madeleine L'Engle
